topics.body:
A bit of a update on gay marriage:
Florida has a 91 day stay on a ruling that is due to expire I believe is November 20th; Florida has 20 million people.  Wyoming's stay is due to expire on Thursday and they in all probability will not fight it.

Basically gay marriage in the next month may come to two more states and cover ~6.7%(just doing the math on the top of my head don't quote me folks) of the USA's population.  So by December 33 states may have gay marriage and cover 68% of the USA's population.
